title: New Skin Type
body: maybe riot could create at type of skin called "Ancients" which are like Neanderthal themed skins which have a similar look to the prehistoric skins but for human like champions and this could apply to Nidalee in her cougar form could be a sabretooth tiger and human form she is a female hunter, the champions which have these skins could belong to a certain tribe and when worn together could have new animations on recall or for certain moves

replies.body: nidalees default skin is neanderthal enough.
Or Pharoh Nidalee, That splash is awful haha Calves bigger then thighs

What if we had Project Zac instead?
